meanings.definition: (verb) to spread to other parts of the body
meanings.sent1: Cancer that metastasizes can be very dangerous.
meanings.sent2: The cancer cells metastasize from the lungs to the liver.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky cancer cell decided to metastasize to the brain for a change of scenery.
meanings.sent4: Fear metastasizes in the mind like a wildfire, spreading uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The rumor about the new student metastasized throughout the school within minutes.
